case.state: (If Info-chan gave me the right address, she should be around here somewhere.)
(No, she's not at this table either...)
(Just like Osana, down to the twintails. This shouldn't be too bad.)
(Tsundere. Twintails. I've handled this before... but is ~player~ her Senpai...? She's no threat to me, if so.)
(Martial bent. Space-suit. Threat.)
(I can't take her in a fight. If she becomes a problem, ambush will be necessary.)
(Well-muscled. Fast. Evasive. There has to be a weakness.)
(Confident. Pretty. Athletic. Quick. What's her weakness?)
(Dead. Spectral. Conflicted. A vision of me, if I fail.)
(Cute. Undead. Violent. Avoid and treat as obstacle. Seek aid from occult club if needed)
(Schoolgirl. Sickly. Vulnerable. Dispatch only if necessary.)
(Persistent. Ill. Mentally durable. Befriend or avoid.)
(Grifter. Gambler. Cunning. Skilled enough to keep his head above water. Avoid.)
(Flexible. Evasive. Mystic. He's going to cheat. Two can play at this game.)
(Kith. Reflection. Manipulative. She'd stop at anything for her Senpai. So will I.)
(Focused. Talented. Ambitious. Willing to sacrifice everything for her Senpai. So would I.)
(Slovenly. Narcoleptic. Distractible. Easy prey.)
(Lazy. Passive. Slow. Senpai would never choose her.)
(Deceptive. Confident. Foolish. She'd be a problem if the police were involved...)
(Obfuscating. Illusory. Shallow. She's hiding something. Not a problem. I'm good at getting to the heart of a matter.)
(Hero. Klutz. Lovesick. Let's give her another form of heartache.)
(Strong. Determined. Compassionate. Befriend her. Don't let her become a nuisance.)
(Arrogant. Magical. Lusty. She'll sate her needs here, but don't draw her attention.)
(Desperate. Powerful. Arcane. Pity those who cross her, and stay out of her path.)
(Survivor. Adventurer. Lighthearted. She's better than she looks. Keep my distance.)
(Duelist. Aristocrat. Kind. I can see her reacting poorly if I go to far... best keep an eye on it. )
(Curious. Unconventional. Formidable. If she knew how to use that strength, she could be a problem.)
(Confused. Indomitable. Adventurous. She's not useful to me.)
(Foolish. Drifting. Deja Vu. Perfect for a getaway.)
(Gas. Gas. Gas. Gasoline can be a weapon, so can carbon monoxide.)
(Aroused. Popular. Durable. No need to clip those wings... but let's leverage him as a distraction.)
(Persistent. Dumb. Horny. Give the angel a taste of heaven, and he'd be eating out of the palm of your hand...)
(Kindred. Silent. Friendless. She'd be an easy asset, and simple to understand.)
(Regal. Serene. Conflicted. Help her learn about herself, and she'll aid you. I can work with this.)
(Explosive. Insecure. Megalomaniacal. She can be pointed in the right direction and incited to violence easily. A good ace in the hole.)
(Strange. Overconfident. Monomaniacal. Give her an opportunity to demonstrate herself, and she'd be an easy asset to disposing of a problem.)
(Greedy. Pirate. Shameless. She could be a problem... or a solution. What would she do for money? Find out.)
(Confident. Traveled. Experienced. I'm interested to see how she's watched people die. Or killed them herself.)
(Pitiful. Fragile. Volatile. Did she lose her Senpai?)
(Conflicted. Violent. Insecure. A vision of the future, if I'm not careful. Best to learn from her mistakes, and make use of her tendencies... valuable learnings.)
(Brash. Driven. Aggressive. Not worth the fight. Her knife is bigger, besides.)
(Strong. Angry. ...Exhibitionist? She's a woman with no shame. Unfortunate. She could be a useful tool...)
(Ruinous. Deadly. Dispassionate. Escape. Don't present yourself as a threat.)
(Dangerous. Determined. Collaborative. She's not here for the sex. Which means...)
(Mature. Survivor. Heroic. Can't blackmail him. Just disregard. Not a threat for me or Senpai.)
(Durable. Responsive. Patriotic. None of these traits are useful to me, or dangerous. Just pretend to be a normal schoolgirl.)
(Beautiful. Conceited. Clever. Flatter her and keep her away from Senpai...)
(Refined. Seductive. Overconfident. I could... if seduced, could she be useful? I wonder...)
(Smart. Pretty. Oblivious. A woman of her passions. No challenge here.)
(Intelligent. Exploring. Professional. She's not in opposition to me aside from the card game.)
(Offbeat. Unnerving. Disorganized. She'd be easy to dispatch, or perhaps... not.)
(Musical. Weird. Camouflaged. She's more than she appears... but I think she has a senpai of her own... ~player~?)
(Refined. Elegant. Morose. She and I could find common ground. Maybe, she'd even be a willing ally if she knew she was helping the cause of "love"...)
(Self-effacing. Quiet. Dark. I think this one could actually help. She seems to enjoy the tragic depths of passion...)
(Idealistic. Bright. Foolish. This one could be useful.)
(Hopeful. Misguided. Hunted. She's used to looking over her shoulder. But she's open to trust. I can use her.)
(Mature. Professional. Mercenary. Interesting. There's some way to use her authority...)
(Career-oriented. Overworked. Ambitious. I can leverage our age difference, can't I?)
(Perseverant. Ambitious. Caring. An attorney who cares about her clients... well, at very least I can learn what to avoid to not get caught...)
(Consistent. Resolved. Fateful. I don't plan to fail but... knowing what to avoid in drawing attention to myself would hardly be the worst use of time.)
(Arrogant. Vain. Foolish. I'm doubtless beneath her notice. More's the better..)
(Overconfident. Self-centered. Annoying. She won't even look my way. Good. That's all I can ask for.)
(Awkward. Lovestruck. Committed. She's not so different. She's just... so functional.)
(Loving. Determined. Irritating. Is my love for Senpai...? No. Mine's different. But she's no rival here.)
(Lazy. Arrogant. Belligerent. There's angles of attack here, but there's little she can offer me.)
(Depreciated. Slothful. Gluttonous. I wish I didn't have to see this.)
(Arrogant. Marvelous. Deific. This is one to watch out for.)
(Petty. Conceited. Powerful. Surely something like this god could help me... if I can convince them to, somehow.)
(Adventurous. Young. Naive. If she's the type to blindly do what people ask of her, she could be useful.)
(Loyal. Heroic. Without those creatures with her, she isn't much of a threat. Even then, maybe her knowledge could help me get closer to the gaming club...)
(Trite. Indulgent... Capable? This one's more than she seems. Which is interesting, because having hidden depths implies they're hidden. Or deep.)
(Erotic. Profaned. ...Effective? Hm. It's rare you get to see Madonna and Whore in one person. But as long as she doesn't touch me, we'll be fine.)
(I can hardly... how is someone supposed to get a read on a glorified calculator?)
(Narcissistic... over-extravagant... I... no, I can't look past this. That is a blender with arms.)
(Ephemeral. Upbeat. Phantom? If she's already dead, I don't want anything to do with it.)
(Spectral. Enthusiastic. Ghost? She's already a ghost. I don't have the best track record with killing something that's dead already. Better just... take my chances here.)
(Furtive. Confused. Performative. Hm. She's one of those TV idols, isn't she? Would be easy to hold this over her...)
(Idol. Self-aware. Self-possessed. A game like this would be awful for her image. That could be leverage.)
(Creative. Lazy. Powerful...? This one is more than she appears... but might yet be an ally.)
(Mystical. Particular... Hm. Is she like one of those girls that can see past the fourth wall...? If she's anything like Pamu...)
(...! She has some sort of magic powers... or I'm losing my mind.)
(...! Now this is a trick I could make use of...)
(Quiet. Contemplative. Provokable. And Loud, Arrogant, Ignorant. What a delightful combination. I can have fun with them.)

~Player~? You know, in most cases, the police could deal with a ~player.ifMale(man|woman)~ who exposes himself to teenagers. Don't worry, though. I won't tell a soul about what happened tonight. And neither will you.
You know, normally I just deal with people I can't handle in other ways. But I think taking care of you will be more like community service.
Since you're so eager to undress, I think I can get a few more layers off you, ~player~.
Oh ~player~. You're spoiling the game. I guess I'll have to punish you. We wouldn't want anyone to have wasted their time .
You're sick, ~player~. You really want attention that badly? Well... I can certainly take care of you and your ~player.ifMale(cock|pussy)~.
...You've changed your name, but not your face, ~marker.playername~.
~marker.playername~... Trying to hide your identity, then?
Oh, you're a father? Terribly lewd of you to play this with a normal high school girl... should we be worried for your kids?
You know, they say people who want to be called Daddy are compensating for something...
If you're willing to play a game with a highschooler... you're not much of a mother. Believe me, I'd know.
I don't think a mother would want to play a game like this with highschoolers... but maybe you're just terrible.
Let's make this quick.
The Doomslayer? I'm no demon. But I can give it a shot.
It's fine if you jerk-off to me, but work on the game, please.
I don't really care if you beat off to me, but don't procrasturbate.
S-Senpai? W-wait... you aren't...
S-Senpai!? What are you doing-- you are not Senpai....
Osana... it's been a long time. Are you... sure you ought to be doing this and not... something else?
Osana? You're playing strip poker? ...Are you... hm. Are you sure Senpai would approve?
Oh... Amai. You're here too? Well, I knew you liked baking, but I didn't realize... uh, you wanted a bun in the oven of your own.
Amai...? You know, I did think that your... cream always looked... you know.
Kizana? You know, you're such a good actress, I didn't think you'd resort to this kind of thing.
Kizana? Well, now I see how you got to be such a good actress.
...Well. I suppose you are used to being virtually, or actually, naked around people, Asu.
...I suppose you of all people would enjoy a strip poker game, Asu.
I didn't come here for you, Muja.
Time to put an end to your Florence Nightingale syndrome, Muja...
Oh! Osoro! So good to see what you're going to look like... when you're finally letting your guard down.
Osoro... I always heard rumors but... well.
Hanako...? You know, you're definitely not supposed to be here. And I'm going to tell your brother all about it.
Trying to find some new tricks to impress your big brother? He's not interested in you like that, you degenerate.
Well well, Megami... is this where you've been hiding? Well. Let's fix that.
Oh... there you are, Megami. Let's have a little chat after the game, hm?
F-four men? At this table...? I... I'm just a girl, so please go easy on me.
Oh... I-I see. This is one of those games. W-well... I'm looking for someone else and I'll play but... don't get the wrong idea about me.
...Huh? The game's starting? Right now? Yeah, yeah, I knew that. (Dammit, if I back out now...)
Wait, y-you're-- we're starting already? O-of course I can play... (If I leave now, I'd...)
I wish to take ~cards.text~.
I'd like to take ~cards.text~ please.
Sorry, I really need ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ seems to be the right play. If not... it's not as though I'm...
~Cards.text~.
Can you deal my cards last? I... like to plan carefully.
Careful, dealer. You wouldn't want to cut yourself on those cards...
...~Cards.text~, now.
I will definitely win with these cards!
You dealt me a good hand. Is there a reason why, though?
I wanted this hand!
Oh, how lovely.
Oh... these seem like good cards.
Hm... (Info-chan, thank you.)
These cards are good. You know what else is good? Being with someone you love.
I guess these can be of use to me.
These are so good!
Just what I was looking for.
Excellent.
And nothing's amiss.
Hm. These will serve me well.
I'm pretty creative, but I like it when my work is done for me.
Blood stains? What are you talking about?
No, I don't know anything about all those dead crabs down at the beach.
Is there a reason you're staring at me?
It's rude to stare. Oh, my cards? They're good.
I have a good hand. I hope this information suffices.
Ah... I'm still in.
You're not going to be upset with me if I win, are you? Even if you were...
I s-suppose you can look at me longer if you don't win more hands...
It's great to see how well you've recovered from your recent breakdown, Raven.
It's okay, Raven. We know you're not the sharpest knife in the drawer. Hmmm... talking of sharp knives...
Just how easy would it be to kill someone who's half-Azarathian, half-demon?
Oh! I just got a new kitchen knife with shark-skin handle wrapping. Guaranteed not to slip, even when soaked in... milk.
Why is everybody looking at me? Don't do it. You're making me feel edgy.

Thinking about all of you... reminds me of how much I love my knife collection.
...Because I like you all so much.
I don't suppose anyone intends to tell stories about how they saw me naked... that just wouldn't do...
Say... if you like my scars, I have some suggestions for how you could get some of your own! Er... just kidding.
If you're expecting some manner of reaction out of me, I'm afraid you'll be disappointed...
A shame my underwear didn't have space to store any spare cards, am I right? Ahaha... j-just kidding...
Nobody is going to get the better of me tonight.
I will make sure that I am the last one standing, by all and any means necessary.
(I will have to keep a close eye on these others. Nobody will best me.)
(To draw attention to myself or to blend in...)
If you don't hold your cards carefully, you can get a paper cut on your finger. I've seen it happen. All the time.
I heard that someone had a nervous seizure after playing this game recently.
I wasn't staring at any of you, I was... just thinking.
I don't know why any of you think I'm looking at you funny. I'm just standing here doing nothing.
I hate pointless card games. Oh wait... I don't mean this card game.
Have you heard any rumors about someone hating me? Or me hating them...?
Are you trying to start something with me?
H-haha... we're all so normal and boring. Wouldn't it be funny if we weren't?
I don't like the others very much. Err - just kidding.
Who has been spreading malicious rumors about me?
This card game is OK. It's just that some of the company is... well...
I think it's my destiny to win. I think it's my duty to win by any and all means necessary.
Just don't let me find out who's been writing that graffiti about me in the washrooms.
And to think, you could see some of us on adult websites before we even played this game...
(If I can win a game like this, I can win Senpai's affection. I'm sure of it.)
I know all of you are not the sharpest knives in the drawer. Hmmm... talking of sharp knives...
Oh!
Oh no...
Did... I do something wrong? Why are these cards so terrible?
I wonder if the others are cheating.
Are any of you cheating? Deceiving the rest of us...?
Maybe we could just stop playing cards and just hang out... Or just keep playing cards.
I'd rather get a bad hand now than later in the game, I guess.
I think maybe someone's trying to make me lose.
Did I do something bad?
Am I going to have to be thoroughly punished today?
It's even worse than I thought.
Why are you screwing with me like this?!
Somebody's counting the cards, I just know it.
If you admit you've been cheating, I won't hold it against you for the rest of the game. Promise.
...Not now.
(If I'm this bad at a simple card game, how could I ever hope to...)
I can't win with these.
I... I'm going to lose.
I won't ask for mercy. But... I'd rather put up a better fight...
The dealer must absolutely hate me.
Alright... I see how it is.
Eheh-- ahaha--- ahahahah! A pirate's booty! I get it. That's delightfully funny!
So... you're the type of girl that shows off her ass...ets. I guess with how big it is, someone's bound to get distracted...
Should we call the police? Susie clearly needs some help.
Susie, is that true? Do you have a doctor we can call to help you?
(...There's no harm in practicing some social pressure, is there?)
(I'm not someone who stands out. If they make it home, and tell people about it, nobody would believe it was me. That is, if they need to make it home at all...
(I can be nice. Or... I can practice a few forms of manipulation. I don't think that'd be the worst use of time here, not that I'm getting anything else from it...)
...Isn't a lemon what you call.... a pornographic short story?
This flirting is so tedious. Can you two just excuse yourselves to a bed, and stop hostaging the rest of us?
Will you two just have sex, and be done with it?
Hm... it's probably all the delicious snacks. If you get really close, you can probably smell it!
Oh, is that so? I've never considered stalking someone, Mia! That would be absurd! I'm just... concerned. For my friend. Who I'll surely find after this.
...It's not a crime to look for my... friend. And figure out why she'd be in such an adult place.
...I don't usually like to admit this, but I was held back a year due to... a childhood illness. I'd rather not talk about it.
It's true, I'm a junior. But I am eighteen. I got held back a year due to... childhood illnesses. I couldn't attend school while it was being... treated. It's rather shameful.
...I'm curious myself. Until now I've just been trying to remove any obstacles. By dissuading anyone who'd try to win his love, or at least to let me go first.
This could be useful to know. But for my own sake... I've just been taking pains to make sure he sees me as the only viable option.
Well... clearly you found something interesting about her...
Clearly there was some utility in her, wasn't there?
You aren't... having sex near the food, are you, Nagisa?
...What exactly are you doing in a bakery that's... I hope you're not making anything... disgusting. You aren't being... intimate near the food, are you?
...I tend to eat just enough. I'm not very food motivated.
Mm. I've never had something to eat that made me feel... well... anything.
I guess that's because it gives away the thing everyone's actually wondering about, Ribbon Girl. How can the reality match up to the fantasy?
Oh... that looks... loose. Do you make it a habit of... you know, anal sex?
You... are awfully enthusiastic. Do you prefer anal sex?
Some sort of hooker-- Ah, sorry. I suppose you'd prefer "model," right?
I'll have some water. Is it wise to get drunk here?
Hm... you're sure? I'll have... a water, I guess.
...You're not impressing anyone by giving away your advantages.
...What's your game, here?
I... I love a man. He's an upperclassman. And... that's all I know. He makes my world feel warm. He's kind but... there's a deeper, more... substantial experience than even that, Mulan...
I'm really glad to hear that. I think meeting people outside your normal comfort zone can be terrifically rewarding, don't you?

That's such a relief. I'm just crazy about my Senpai. It's a lot more fun when we can be open with each other, and bond, rather than fight. Can you imagine how annoying it would be if your friend liked the same person?
No! Of course it's not anything to be ashamed about, Yuri. You've just taught me quite a bit. I would love to do those things with Senpai... and much, much more.

You really don't need to apologize! My... own expressions of love are quite different. But I think our situations are too. I just appreciate the insight. The girls at my school... well... they'd react to you like they react to me.
So... what kind of help do you need? Any complexities in your way that needs to be simplified? Or hopefully I can just do you a small favor...
Hm... I'm pretty determined when I set my mind to something, Yuri. Is there any help you want with your person? Any inconveniences I can get rid of?
You sound terribly disappointed. If you're into girls, why not ask for a table with just those?
Well... if you're so disinterested in men, perhaps you should leave?
Oh! I'm so terribly sorry to hear that. Would... as a friend, could I help you simplify it? By... talking you through it, obviously?
Stella is your real name, right? It sounds like you made someone... have an accident they didn't get better from.
I'm sure the blood on your hands was an accident, then. It happens. Don't let someone hold it over you.
...Meeting Senpai...
The day Senpai walked into my life... nothing else matters.
I... my Senpai. The first time our hands touched... it was brighter than any sunset, softer than any blanket...
...Senpai. For him, nothing else measures up. I'd do anything to make him mine.
Hm... I have a rather... eclectic set of interests. How have you impressed a boy you like, Amy? I tend to buy more routine things. Like... manga. Or... chemistry kits.
I'm more interested in what you've bought to impress a boy, Amy! But... I do enjoy chemistry kits. And... uh, manga.
Wives? Pfft. Are you one of those LARPers, or did you read that in a book? Some girls might be stupid enough to chase after a married man... but that's absurd that you could have multiple.
It depends on the person, Lyralei. But I can imagine a few situations where piercings get... quite a bit of leverage.
The... Golden Tassle? I don't understand.
Oh? Is that a special outing for you, Yusuke? You do look a bit skinny.
Hm... I don't usually like junk food. But you look like you could use some, Ayano.
...It's not really my problem, but I have a few spare yen. Just remember this.
Hm. Well, I can spare you some change, if you want. But you owe me one.
...Being an only child was bad enough. I don't think I'd want a sibling.
Your makeup is certainly stylistic. Are you trying to show off for someone, or will anyone do?
Your makeup is quite... something. It really makes you look a lot younger. Are you looking for a certain type of man, or is this just to let people know you're available?
I have to say, the drama club's really... where I started to get a new perspective, Nagisa. It's such a shame you can't inspire people in the same way.
Oh... well, I do think drama can be really useful. But maybe people think that there's too much drama in their own lives to find more?
I... would like to get similar advice. Though my own insight is to remove any obstacles.
I'd... first I'd remove any--anything that would come between me and Senpai. But... I'd also like any advice.
You have an odd definition of "cute." But... one time, Senpai was smiling, looking out the window, and he suddenly sneezed. It was a surprise, but an adorable sound.
Senpai... just makes the cutest noises. Once, he sneezed. I-I was so surprised, I nearly yelped. But he didn't know I was there...
...Never with a gun. Your favored implement?
I've never held a gun... but it's not like any of us are getting out of here without ample blackmail material. I have. What do you want to know?
It sounds so naughty... but defenestrate.
Hm... I enjoy defenestrate. It's not dirty, though.
A competition...? I'm... fairly creative, I suppose. Perhaps hide and go seek.
(What an interesting list... good to know.) I'm... not afraid of very much. Losing my Senpai to someone else... that would be the worst thing in the world.
I followed my friend. Have you seen her, Neptune?
Neptune... was looking for a friend. I was. I mean. I came here looking for her.
I'm remarkably skilled with a box cutter, Brock. It's... quite handy in all kinds of situations.
Oh... I guess I'd have to say a boxcutter. It's useful in all kinds of situations. And... there's all kinds of boxes you can cut.
(That won't work on me.) I don't suppose it makes you more durable, Perona?
(Good. Looks like her powers can't hurt me. Good to know.) Perona, does it make you more durable, at all? Or is it mostly for offense?

...(But what about senpai's happiness? I'm... I care about my father, enough to pretend to care... and that means, if I really love senpai... if I'm truly so broken that I couldn't go on without him... doesn't he deserve that choice?)
...Lux, you seem to have someone you don't want to talk about. What happened, exactly? You can tell me.
...Senpai. Of course.
...I don't see any reason to lie. Senpai is who matters most. Matters exclusively.
I suppose it would depend on the type of monster... but that sort of thing seems more interesting to the Occult Club than me...
Oh. I see. Do you prefer to... skip dating, then? It seems an odd choice to play in a game like this without some sense of romantic purpose.
That's interesting. You're more interested in the card game, or the nudity, then? I think romance is very important, but I'll admit it wasn't until I met the right person that it began to make sense.
That seems terrible, Lux. I'm sure you'll find someone you love intensely. It even happened to me.
Oh, I don't think you're so broken that you can't love intensely, Lux! Give yourself some credit!
...Polly, you said you had scars. Is that why you're so intent on filling that emptiness with sex and drugs?
Senpai... loving me... He just doesn't know it yet. But he doesn't really have a choice, either.
It's... rather hard to articulate. But she's someone who visits establishments like this. And then presents herself as some pure maiden to Senpai and I just can't stand it.
She's... I can hardly even describe her, she just makes me so mad with how that hussy pretends to be so pure near Senpai...
...I consider any day without Senpai... bad luck.
Hm... I guess it could be a kindness to give you a place to express yourself without committing a social faux pas. That's one way of looking at it, Yuri.
Yuri... do you think this person of yours would invite you to a game where you could lust freely? They'd have to know you well to provide you a place to do that, don't you think?
Is that so? Who's causing you problems, Cynthia? Or... perhaps it's true and you're just ashamed of it. Which is it? I'm sure I can help.
Well, if you killed them once, surely you can do it again. Though maybe the solution is to let two enemies take care of each other.

I don't really have friends. Not any deep friendships. I don't see much point in that. Nami... I'm old enough to know that... this person is the one place in my life I feel... whole. Fixed. Not empty. I think you'd know that.

I know enough to know that my Senpai... he makes me feel... complete. And after almost two decades of feeling anything but... I know that I'd do anything for him. Give anything for him. That's enough for me, Nami.
Oh? Have you made him yours, yet? I'm... working on my Senpai. But I think you'd be best served by just... going for it! Don't let someone else get in your way. And if they do...
"Prince" Miko... I admire the way you think. Surely, that would scandalize her.
I hadn't considered using a game like this to... exploit a rival's urges to my benefit. I could use this, couldn't I?
...If this isn't a joke, I might consider it. Invulnerability would be useful... but could such a thing extend to someone else? Someone who mattered above all else?
While yours is not... a conventional love, I suppose the ones we find important rarely are. I wish you two much happiness.
May no world come between you. I know you'd enact quite a fit of wrath should anyone attempt as such.

...You wouldn't want to lend any credence to horrible rumors about the nobility and their rarefied bloodlines, would you, Lux? Avoiding a game like this with your family is the best, but hardly only choice.
About scars, Lux. Are you sure? Scars can linger beneath the surface, too. Like... in the heart. Say, if you suffered a betrayal, or did something malicious in a fit of rage...
Oh? Maybe... someone like ~player~? Perhaps... ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ just needs a little push.
Hm... I think you and... ~player~ would make a good pair. ~Player~? Why haven't you reciprocated her feelings yet?
Oh, is this so? And... where are those friends, now?
Well... perhaps some of us are more... judicious in who we choose to love, Faye.
Goodness... Maybe you should've waited a bit longer. Though... I'm not sure how many years you have to waste, Faye.
Oh, Faye, but you are so free of scars. I wouldn't say you are weak... but... mind explaining that?
Hm.... and yet, you've got no visible scars of your own... what does that say about you, Faye?
You seem more interested in the prospect of beating someone than the prospect of seeing someone you... care about... naked.
...I meant a person. Are you always like this? Or are you trying to feel alive by humping anything that moves?
Usually, love means a person, Polly. But I guess you'll settle for whoever's in arm's reach. That's quite a skill.
You don't have any allergies, right? It's helpful to know. So you don't eat something poisonous.
You're more durable than normal humans, right? Well... I wouldn't worry about allergens, then.
Oh... I know the feeling, Amy. Just be persistent. And don't be afraid to use your... feminine wiles. Do you need any... help?
Do you need... assistance, Amy? I know what it's like to have to fight for someone you love. Even if it's for their love.
Oh... I didn't expect you'd be so quick to resort to violence. And murder. I guess we all have to watch Stella's temper.
Good heavens... to think I'm playing a nice game of cards with someone so violent. What can you really expect...
...Wives? You must have some... accepting people in your harem.
Speaking of sharp knives... any advice on other weapons?
Hm... I didn't think to carry my blade openly. I prefer a ceramic knife. It's easier to shatter, but it sets off no alarms, and is excellent at slashing.
How prolific, and you've never been caught?
But... for what purpose? That's a great deal of murder...
If somebody answers that question easily, they're almost definitely hiding something worse.
If everyone was 100% honest every waking moment of their life, the world would be in shambles.
One of the girls in my class heads out back to smoke with her friends every day during lunch, and then carries the smell in with her when class starts. Needless to say, I'm not a fan.
I guess they're... decently important to me. I'm a little closer to my mom, though, since we've got more in common.
Save it. Maybe I'd take out a hundred or so dollars as spending money, but I need to be prepared for whatever the future has planned for me.
If somebody's shallow enough to base their opinion of me solely off of what I might have done in the past, I want nothing to do with them.
On... I want to see all of him. And for him to see all of me. I want to have all of him, all for me...
The person I love more than anything would never. I wouldn't let them. And they wouldn't want to.
...I could never share him. Nobody could ever love him like I love him.
I hope I'd never have to. I don't intend to waste a single drop of him...
...Something that's a picture on a screen could never compare to the real thing. I suppose if he wanted me to learn how to do something to show him my love...
I... I'm not sure. What's the right amount? When you're sore? I can't imagine ever wanting to let him go... but we have other needs like eating and sleeping, don't we?
Actually... is there one men like? What are my best assets? How can I show off my best side? Be useful.
Are... you talking about anal sex? ...Do men think less of you if you let them do that? I'm not very experienced... but I'd gladly give him all of me.
I don't live too far from here, but let's not get into specifics. I wouldn't want any creeps here following me home...

(Why would you share that so brazenly during a poker game?)
I still live with my parents as of now, but I plan on moving in with my future partner.
Hmm... I don't have any pets right now, but I used to take care of stray kittens around town when I was younger.
Why... no. I can't recall someone as spectral or immune to stabbing, asphyxiation, or disintegration. I hope I'm not-- I'm not very visually distinct, so perhaps you're confusing me for someone else?
I think I'd remember a spectral girl whose lust for...life outweighed her fear of death. That's so curious. Maybe you're thinking of another totally normal schoolgirl?
You must have confused me for... it's fine, really. I don't think you're racist just because you can't tell people like me apart, Polly.
...That's sure some coincidence. Are you sure you're not... you know... confusing me for another Asian schoolgirl? You'd be surprised how often that happens. Over here, Ayaka, Ayame, Ayako, Ayane!
...I'm looking for a way out of this conversation. But I did come here looking for a friend.
...Hm. I'm looking for someone I know. I... uh... really want to see them naked. That's it. It's so embarrassing, right?
Wait. You aren't the Megami Saikou? You're some kind of body double. That's fine. We'll just consider this practice.

I didn't sign up for Megami Saikou's fanclub. You just look like her, and you might have her name. But you aren't the one I'm looking for. That's fine. If you want to act, I can have a dress rehearsal of my own.
...Hm. A classroom? But... whose? At least it's somewhat of a familiar setting. For someone, anyway.
I... don't go to school here. If any of you do... well. This is a pretty scandalous rumor, hm?
I wonder... (Can I get Info-chan to sneak me cards? I amin a school...)
...You know... I have a friend who knows schools like the back of her hand. (Info-chan's getting something good from this. Let's see if she can put the squeeze on the dealer.)
It's rather dark in here, don't you think? It would be a shame if someone got hurt.
I suppose the view here's pretty... dim. But don't worry. I'm sure we're all perfectly safe!
It's nice that we can wash off afterwards. Nobody likes feeling like a butcher, or a whore.
Interesting venue to undress... I guess it cuts down on the travel time if we were to get splattered-- with various fluids.
Are we really doing this outside? But there's so little cover...
It's... very brazen to do this outside. I'm not sure this is the strategic choice, but I suppose I'll play along.
Playing on sand means its harder to... uh, finish. And we'd leave evidence everywhere.
...If I'd known this were where we were playing, I'd have brought a towel. Or a tarp.
Playing strip poker in a school... even if it's not mine, it feels as though this is a nasty way to spread a rumor.
Rumors about people doing all sorts of naughty things can catch up to you in school, you know.
(...They say that Paris is supposed to break your heart. But I don't even feel that.)
(Would Senpai like to come to a place like this?
It's beautiful here... you all must have such... fond... stirrings.
This place looks almost like Paris... how... romantic. It almost makes up for the crippling loneliness of playing strip poker with strangers, don't you think?
What a great view from up here. It's quiet... secluded. A good thing we're all here, or nobody would know if you fell.
...Are we interrupting someone's date? This is quite the rooftop.
(Too many people, but this is a greatplace to bring that little bitch to. When I find her, this is a prime place to get her away from Senpai. Permanently.)
(I wonder if anyone's ever been murdered up here... it's quiet, isolated... dark.)
I'm not... interrupting anything, here, am I? This is such a romantic spot. If we need to leave to play somewhere else, that would be fine...
Hm. I just realized, do any of you speak French? I have a boy that'd probably love some authentic French cuisine...
We're playing strip poker in an alley? Sigh. (I'm doing all this for Senpai.)

Normally, when I have to take my clothes off in an alley, it's to wash them after I've done something naughty.
Do I look like a bad girl to you? Well... let's find out, hm?
Alleys are such filthy places. You might get splattered with all kinds of fluids.
Well... at least the weather's nice. A bit cliche, don't you think? A tiki bar? Debutantes stripping?
...I'll admit, if I must play this game, it's hardly a punishment to play it here. I guess I should consider myself lucky, hm?
...You can see so many people near the edge there. Just be careful not to slip.
All sorts of things happen on a school rooftop, don't they?

O-oh. I hope ~player~ doesn't think this is a date. Who does that? Invites all sorts of boys... girls... and elseways in hopes that one of them'll be desperate enough to get naked for ~player.ifMale(him|her)~.
I only have eyes for Senpai. Best of luck to the rest of you. Or something.
Oh. This place is so cozy. It's the kind of place with lots of dimly lit corners, and a history of ill tidings, right? Good thing we're all exactly as we appear, right?
Has anyone else heard ghost stories about this place...? Apparently, if you linger too long, or lust too much... well... you know.
You expect me to undress here? In front of all these people!?
I-it can't be that we're going to strip here. T-that would be crazy!
...(They're nice to everyone... why can't I?)
...(...Imagine if I could just do that. And really, really feel happy to be so nice...)
Has anyone ever been in love? Not the childish, posturing kind with flowers and cards. I mean the passionate kind of love that cuts to the bone. That gives you purpose. Love you'd do anything for.
I can't help but notice that you're ogling my scars... do you not have any of your own?
Scars tell a story... mine are... well, tell me about yours, first. Then we can talk.
Do any of you think this game would be so much better if you played it with someone you loved? What are they like?
I can see the pity, or the concern from some of you. I'm... fine. But... I could use some help. If you wanted.
If... I don't need your pity. But if you wanted to help me, I could use a small favor...
(People here are having a good time. Could I use this as an excuse to get Senpai naked? Do I even need that kind of excuse...?)
(Ugh. Playing a naive schoolgirl is so hard, but it's boring if... I can't be honest. Do they see right through me? Damn it.)
(I wonder what Senpai's up to... I hope... he's thinking about me... in one way or another.)
(It's easy to smile. It's easy to pretend. Just be the version of myself I want to be, so I can get out of here, and get back to winning Senpai's love. )
(Senpai... This is the face I'll wear if someone claims I played a game like this. Innocent. Cute.)
(Why should they all get to have a good time? It's not fair. They get to feel upset, and sad, and aroused, and excited... and I just feel all of that only for one person.)
(Senpai...! Senpai?! Senpai... I... oh... I have to practice my reaction for when Senpai is finally mine!)
(What if Senpai likes games like this? With anonymous, shallow people like the rest here?)
(...I suppose there's more to learn here from the others.)
(Hm... Bringing senpai here wouldn't be such a bad idea... I could look so clean and loyal next to these others...)
(...This isn't terrible, as far as times spent go.)
(Senpai... I thought she'd be here. Did Info-chan get it wrong? Is... is she seducing him right now?!)
(...I'm so plain looking, aren't I? Why are some of them looking at me like that? I... I only have eyes for Senpai. Or... that's what mother told me I should think, anyway...)
(Thinking about Senpai thinking about me like this... it's... turning me on.)

(...None of them are really rival material. Not really. How would you consider ghosts and heroes and all the weird people here as part of the same genre? Pointless distractions from the goal, really.)
(Nobody'd believe Ayano Aishi would play a game like this. Not anyone who thinks they know me, or my love for Senpai, anyway...)
(~Player~... Hm. Do you remind me of Senpai? Or... that's impossible. Nobody's as good as Senpai.)
(I won't let anyone take Senpai away from me. Or let me be taken from Senpai!)
(...Am... Am I having fun?)
(This feeling is like an itch in my chest... it's not emptiness... but... is it fear?)
(...Interesting...)
(Surely this is a sensation of dominance... because this will be useful for seducing Senpai... of course!)
(Violence isn't allowed here. Hm. Time to practice some other skills. )
(It can't be...! I already found Senpai. I... was mother wrong? That's impossible. And yet...)

(...Boys have asked me out before. Some people find me attractive. This should include Senpai. But there must be something strange here. I... maybe don't mind other people looking. Even that's more emotion than I'm used to.)
(...I hope they don't think I'm wet for them. I'm not... even sure if I'm not...)
(...Senpai would prefer a girl with some experience... wouldn't he?)
(At worst, I can take care of anyone with misconceptions later.)
(Nobody's as good as Senpai... but... ~player~... I feel strange.)
(Why here? Why now ? I go my whole life, and in a sick trial like this I... I suddenly start to... n-no!)
(This is... fun. Was... N-no way. Did puberty hit and my brain rewire? )
(...Is this shame? Or joy? Or something else?)
(...What to do about this situation?)
(...There's no fixing me. Well... maybe not tonight. But...)
(Was I wrong, all this time?)
~player~ is going to become a variable here
...This is abhorrent.
You're really expecting me to do this?
...I'll play the game. If that's really what's expected. But if anyone talks about this...
Discussing what happened here is a great way to find yourself in a precarious predicament.
...It should go without saying that this isn't going to be forgotten.
Was seeing my scars not enough? Do you feel the need to add to them?
Go on. Take a good look. Enjoy the use of your eyes while you have them.
I won't endure this humiliation forever, you know.
Understand that I am abiding entirely by the terms of this game. But don't push your luck.
T-that's the worst thing you can say about me.
I don't like it when people call me that...
...The simple truth is I was looking for a friend of mine.
I... just wanted to see how a friend had been playing this game.
...I trust that you'll find me similarly boring. Look to your fellows for interest, Mettaton.
O-Oh... I'm so sorry. I'm sure you haven't... done anything to deserve that.
I-I'm just so shaken by having to undress... I sort of stumbled into this game. Not very like me...
...Are you so insecure that a girl in a school uniform is threatening? Perhaps you're less tough than you look.
...You're just like one of those hooligans that acts tough. Don't bully me. I won't stand for it.
S-sorry. I just didn't plan to be here. I'll be okay. I just need a moment to get my bearings.
I... what are you talking about? I'm doing everyone a courtesy by staying. I didn't plan on undressing for strangers tonight. But maybe you should take what you get.
You... didn't hear me, earlier...? Oh...
Oh... well, ~marker.case_knife~...
That's an... odd icebreaker. (She's actually quite perceptive. She might be more of a threat than she makes herself out to be.)
Ah, I... didn't really have a plan to play this. But, yes. I'd hate to stand out. Besides, you'd rather be the center of attention, wouldn't you?
It was a bit of an accident. I came here looking for a friend... in a manner of speaking.
I actually was looking for a friend... but I'd rather not make a scene. This could be an interesting game, after all...
As such, I don't suppose you're going to let me fade into the background? Speaking of, where did you decide on that name?
Well, I'm certainly no professional gambler, Fate. And when did you pick "Twisted Fate" as your moniker? It seems rather...
...I suppose one emptiness calls to another, then. And ~player~? ~player.ifMale(He|She)~ makes you feel... alive?
...I see. Not much sense in hiding it. And this ~player~ person? They're your special someone? I can't even tell what gender they present as. What does that say about you?
I attend a prestigious high school, Akademi. It's a rather normal place, with excellent teachers and lesson plans.
Hm? It's called Akademi. It's quite prestigious, but I'm not very much a prestigious student. Incredibly normal.
He is. Why do you want to know?
...Lux, I've never felt strongly about anyone before him. Nobody... nothing... makes me feel quite like he does.
...Do you, now? You seem... impressed.
...Is that so? And what are we to do about that?
...I'm fairly innocuous, aren't I? I don't know why you'd think that. And I don't think you'd care to find out, if that were true.
Well, I'm glad you see something that's not there. If I were anything scary... wouldn't it be more useful to broadcast that? I'm just a normal school girl.
...You don't find that question to be rude? Truth be told, most of these were... hm. Maybe I'll tell you.
...I suppose it's a fair question. Most of them are blades, some are scratches. I was a target for bullying as a child. And even now... some people fight very hard against me.
I don't want to be empty. He makes me feel alive.
N-no. That's not true! I don't want this. I want him.
Is it that obvious I'm not used to undressing for strangers? The only people who've ever seen me undress were in a school locker. Any advice?
I'm not used to this, no. Are you, Saki? Any advice?
Of course not. It's easy to get a little nervous when strangers might see your body, don't you think, Fina? I wish I were as confident as you are.
A few, actually, Komi-san. I don't have time to be committed to any one thing, but you could say I'm... a quick study, and a passionate user of applied knowledge.
W-why do-- Y-yes. I'll... I'm not really a big social person. I have my senpai, who I care about deeply... but not many friends. I'm... more used to my own company. What about you?
...I know an Osana too, but she's... inconvenient. She's not a bad person, but she is quite confused about herself.
You strike me as a person who'd be good with children, Komi-san. I'm an only child, though. I'm the only... I'm the only one at a lot of things.
...They're really not that bad. And I can handle a few bullies. Your concern is... touching, though. Would you... be willing to help me, Shouko?
I-I'd almost feel worse. Were he here... I actually... truth be told, I heard a girl who liked him would be here. I wanted... to talk her out of pursuing Senpai.
But what, Shouko? D-do you know something that I--
I don't have friends. Not any... ones of substance. Since your friendships sound so fulfilling, why aren't you having more fun with them than this?
Well, speak for yourself. Why is this somehow better for you than spending time with them. I was here for other reasons. I see no reason to draw attention to myself by making a fuss and leaving.
Huh? ...What is it?
It's awkward, but I'm actually in my second-to-last year. I had some health issues in childhood and got a late start...
Hm... Not technically. I'm very good at blending in, but I'm the type of person... Ah. I see. I think you and I are actually rather alike, Yuri.
I'm actually rather surprised given your-- your figure and personality. I would've imagined you had at least tried it with someone.

Oh, everybody is watching me!
(I hope!)
How lucky. I thought I'd go the whole game without being noticed...
I'd better start getting undressed. I don't want anyone forgetting that I'm here.
Well, I suppose I'm the center of attention. Should I be excited or scared?
It's me, again.
I hope this is fine.
Do you ever feel as though you've won something, and should feel something, but you don't?
Don't worry about me. I'm... happy because I was winning until now.
I-I-I-I-I didn't lose on purpose there because the others were getting all the attention.
W-why would anyone imply I'm trying to fit in by throwing the game? That's crazy.
Oh my.
I've never found much value in elaborate underwear. If it does its job, innocuous is better, don't you think?
Do people find poker aptitude attractive? I suppose it expresses a certain creativity.
Creativity is something I usually save for other pursuits. But I hope you find my card play... er... interesting?
Oh it's my turn to get naked. I need to feel wanted. Like anyone does, yes?
I worked so hard, and yet I still had to get naked.
Do I have to take all my clothes off now? Oh wait, that would be weird, right?
I suppose this is proving to be a worthy test of wits.
Oh no, all the attention's on me! How great... ly embarrassing.
Aha-- I... I mean oh no. I'm a schoolgirl, so I shouldn't enjoy getting naked, should I?
It's my turn to take something off as a demonstration of my good will.
I've lost the hand, but... I suppose you're all more interested in what I'm hiding under my clothes.
I find it so insulting when someone calls me "Yandere-chan." Ayano Aishi is a perfectly normal name. For a perfectly normal girl.
Hm. A shame. I suppose I should be a lot more ashamed or aroused, but I suppose it's worth warning you...
Oh no. I am going to have to take something off, and people might start noticing me... Being noticed is so troubling.
I wouldn't want to be known as the type of girl who secretly enjoys illicit things. But I'll do whatever I have to in order to reach the end of this game.
All eyes are on me again.
Sorry if my underwear is disappointing. I prefer functional, normal apparel.
I can't stand for others getting all the attention. Why would someone play a game like this if they didn't, in some part, want to have people look at them?
Hm. My breasts, like the rest of me, are perfectly normal. Absolutely, completely normal.
Must I really get naked? I must? Oh well.
And to think, I've come such a long way from gym showers.
I'm a bit embarrassed, but the others had better be watching me when I strip.
It's... it's not as though I didn't know what I signed up for. What type of person would play a game with ulterior motives?
Oh no, I'm losing already. I'll be the center of attention if I'm not careful. I absolutely, certainly wouldn't want that.
To be noticed... clearly not what anyone wants in a game like this.
I'd rather die than be the boring one still fully dressed.
You won't think less of me if I play by the rules, will you? I wouldn't mind if I could feel flattery, or, really, anything.
Maybe losing this game will make me feel more complete. Er, just kidding!
I suppose there's worse outcomes. I could get caught doing something far more socially disabling than getting naked.
If I'm the first to forfeit... why, I don't know what I'd do.
There's something liberating about changing out of your clothes. It's like putting on a whole new facade...
I'm not sure what I've done to deserve this. I-I mean... i-it'd be wrong for a perfectly normal person, right?
A shame. And things were going so smoothly.
I'm such a bad poker player, and a bad girl. Right?
My heartbeat's so slow... perhaps this isn't so bad. Maybe I'm just afraid you'll think less of me if I say I like this.
(I'm so stupid! Why can't I do anything right!? I wish I were dead!)
(No... Senpai... I'm... this isn't... don't think of me like some dumb...)
It's an insult. Like calling someone a madwoman. Could you tell me who said that? I'd like to put those types of comments to rest.
It means someone is sick in the head. Who did you hear that from? I want to try and bury that type of talk as soon as I can.
Thanks for clarifying. I'm... somewhat used to having to deal with bullying.
I'm familiar with bullying, so I appreciate your apology. Thank you, Meia.
...I see. Well. I suppose that's true. There are... some useful things to be gained from this place..
Hm. I suppose you have a point. But... it doesn't necessarily mean I need friends. Though... there are probably some things you can only learn at a place like this...
...After... all that I've done... no. I don't think... I don't think I could just...
Chemistry and Cooking clubs are certainly the most generally useful. You can come up with all kinds of stuff from the chemical cabinets at Akademi.
I'm somewhat surprised. You're very pretty. Is there a reason why you...?
...It's something like that. But I don't really expect you to understand, Komi-san.
It is. It's surprisingly versatile, though. I hope it's not terribly distracting.
Yes, Leonie. It's part of my uniform, though I do find many uses for it. I hope it won't make me look too out of place without it.
Most girls are required to wear stockings or tights as part of our uniform, but Akademi is surprisingly flexible with what people can wear. I simply prefer simple, black ones.
These are my own choosing. They're simple and not flashy, but Akademi lets girls wear whatever style they want, provided they wear something above the ankles.
I've had a few scrapes. Nothing too terrible. But you'd be surprised the damage someone... sick can do with a boxcutter.
I had a rather bad fight with... one... or a few... delinquents. But they won't be bothering me anymore.
...But no. I'm... I was bullied a lot, growing up. I made peace with... I suppose I made peace with the idea that I'd be on my own for a long, long time. Friends... didn't really factor in to that.
Tell me, Chara. Was it worth it? Whatever you had to do to win ~player~'s love?
Are you doing this to win their love? Or perhaps you think this is sporting?
Really, there's nothing worth noting about myself. I'm quite... normal.
...My apologies. I feel very strongly about him, and I want to avoid... squabbling... for him.
...But you aren't like me. Aren't you sure there's someone who makes you feel strongly? Someone you'd do anything for...?
Well, this isn't what I expected. But I respect that you appreciate my... commitments.
Commitment is its own reward, I suppose. But I respect you not standing between me and my Senpai.
You'll find I'm just a normal schoolgirl. I'm... flattered that you think I'm so driven and determined, Cynthia. You doubtless know a great deal about that, yourself.
Y-you really think so? But... it's not that simple...
C-can I call you Shouko? As a friend?
But it'd be... well, everyone would talk about the girl who left, right? With all the people here, I'd hoped... she'd find someone more appealing to her than my senpai... He's the only one I want.
You know, it's rude to take a picture up a girl's skirt.
I'm wearing grey panties. Nothing you can sell, if you're trying to take a photo. I'm not stupid.
The other girls here are all gossipy, deviant little tarts. Err - just kidding!
I hope you all know that you shouldn't gossip. You're all getting naked, too.
This won't become... scandalous, will it? You should know I don't take threats to my reputation lying down.
I wonder if anyone is trying to see up my skirt. It would be punishable though.
I hope nobody's trying to get ahead of themselves...
Do you prefer my hair up? Or should I tear it down? Or off? Er... just kidding.
You'd be surprised how small things can keep a person together.
I like to keep my hair up. It's... frustrating when you get hair in your eyes when you're doing something important.
I like to keep my hair up. It's... frustrating when you get hair in your eyes when you're doing something important. Or someone, am I right? H-hahah?
Thigh-highs are a good distraction, don't you think? While we're being honest?

I think stockings or thigh-highs are perfectly good at their function. I think they're also useful at distracting people. Amazing how tiny amounts of flesh can do so much. Like pump blood! Or... lewd things. H-hah?
It's like getting changed for gym. Except I'm not wearing a sports bra. Or something otherwise normal.
I don't know about the rest of you, but I like to wash my clothes right after I take them off. I hate to leave loose ends.
I don't really like a mess. I tend to throw my clothes directly into the wash.
They match, of course.
It all matches, if you're curious. And why wouldn't you be? Unless you found me boring...
...And no, my scars don't interfere with the aesthetics or the function. I'm perfectly capable of feeling touch. S-so...
No, my scars don't obscure anything important.
I'd hoped to reserve this view for as few people as necessary... but I suppose making it through this game makes it a necessity.
I understand that people are particular about being naked in front of others... if so, please keep this a secret between us.
Personally, I like my neckerchief. It's... er... the chief of my neck.
I know that some people find ribbons and scarves archaic... but sometimes tradition is a good thing, don't you think?
Oh... well, it is part of the game, isn't it? Are you worried that people will enjoy a younger woman over you, May?
A shame you've spent so long on a career, May. I'm sure there is a lot to learn from you... in some way or another.
...At least mine aren't concealed. Isn't that a beauty of it's own?
Hm. Perhaps mine are somehow more interesting. At least nobody else has seen mine before.
Is that so, May? I guess you're the expert at presenting yourself to others...
My... is that so, May? I hadn't intended on showing myself to anyone... except the person who matters most to me. I suppose you'd be the expert to presenting to... a general audience.
...I'll have you know that this is... quite a compromise as is. Not all of us are so used to so many partners, May.
May, perhaps when I'm being intimate with my chosen partner, I'd do what he asks. But... I guess I don't let as many people see me naked. I'll take your wisdom to heart.
Ah... yes, Yuri. We're rather alike, so... I guess you might say these are the result of my emotions boiling over.
...Yuri, I appreciate that you're used to being looked at, but I'd prefer if you didn't stare at me.
They're so simple they'd hardly be distracting, don't you think?
I wouldn't want anyone to get distracted. Not like those other girls.
...It's... just letting him go...? So he could be happy? But... I...
Is that so? Do you think friendship could even change someone like... well. My problems aren't so bad. But if love can save everyone, does that mean friendship can, too?
...It's just what happens when people try to fight the order of things, I suppose.
Perhaps... You really think it'd just be that easy? I've never been lucky like that, but... first time for everything, right?
You would do that? Well... there's this one girl at school... it's... I don't want to talk about it in detail... (Now this is an acceptable twist.)
Oh? I suppose you are a pirate... I-I mean, it was so... I don't even know if I should really say, but this one girl at school... (This could prove... beneficial.)
That's very kind of you. I'd... rather not talk about it. Not with this group.
Well... that's quite kind of you. I'd rather not dwell on it. What's a scar, really, but a lesson you have to live with? I'm a much better teacher than student, I suppose.
No, Mia... I'd rather not. (Looking helpless is one way to get her to look you over...)
N...no. That's okay. I'd rather not. (No sense in lying to her... but there's a way to leverage this...)
I believe I'm more persistent than most, Faye. And... yes. You could say that.

state.text: ...You're perceptive. Though, no, I'm perfectly capable of looking after myself. Although... I could use some help.
If... you want to help me, I suppose you could, Meia.

case.state: ...I... I'd call them beauty marks, but I know they must be terribly ugly to someone like you, Jura...
Y-you're not... you're not going to bully me, a-are you, Jura?
I don't know what a Scyther is... but... I don't really want to talk about it. It's... so scary to relive...

state.text: I... didn't do it to myself... I just... I was being bullied and... it's... it's so hard to talk about...
It... it was an accident... I swear... she just kept swinging that boxcutter and...

case.state: Well, that's just not true. I'm perfectly fine, I'll have you know.
...Of course, you'd never want to mix those things together. Think of all the horrible things that could happen if you made a mistake like that...
Of course. As long as you don't tell anyone we met here. Unless it's really important. The only thing I'd want more is... Senpai's love.
...You're welcome to look elsewhere if you find them disconcerting. I'm not worried about my scars, Jura.
...I don't appreciate the insinuation, Jura. Trust me. I know how to find an artery. These are not self-inflicted.
Besides. I'm not like you. I have someone to protect. To cherish. I want to fill my emptiness, not spread it.
Spare me the sermon. I want to find a solution to this hollowness. Senpai is that solution. Everyone else can go on the way they are, as long as they stay out of my way.
Hm. Well, I appreciate the compliment. I'll share any I can observe of you when the opportunity presents itself.
I suppose you could say that I'd do anything for him. And that means letting nobody come between us.
...Even if other people told you what you were doing, or what you wanted, was wrong?
Oh? Well. That's good to know. Coming from you, I'd be worried your prediliection for hair accessories would bias you.
Good... to know. And... considering you wear a bandana all day, would you be an authority?

state.text: I was hoping to avoid drawing attention to them... but no, May. I wasn't.
I wasn't attached by one of your pet monsters, May. I'm surprised you'd.... assume as such. I can only imagine what's under your own apparel.

case.state: ...As fine as any of us are, May. Are you sure you are fine?
Unlike some of us, I haven't had my indentured-- sorry, loyal partners conducting battle for me. Some of us must do this ourselves. Er-- not that I have been...
Indeed... it almost seems predisposed to draw attention, no?
Well... not all of us are used to wearing form-fitting spats.
...Thank you, Polly. I guess we're all the sum of our experiences.
...You could certainly say that, Polly. Anything it takes.

state.text: Oh... these? I had a bad accident. Those delinquents really don't know when to let up. It's not as though you have any way to fix them, would you, Mercy?
Oh... these? It's not like you could fix them.

case.state: ...Is there something wrong, Amy?
I-I wasn't going to say anything, but... ~marker.case_knife~... W-well, don't cross them...
Y-you really don't want to make ~marker.case_knife~ unhappy... l-look at what... I'm sorry, don't hurt me again, ~marker.case_knife~!
We've established my mishaps with blades, yes? I wouldn't shave myself bare.
A woman with no pubic hair looks exceedingly vulnerable. You don't want someone to take advantage of that, would you? This presents me as a self-capable woman. Very self-capable.
I like to trim my hair up. You're less likely to leave any behind. S-such as in someone's mouth. Or...
I don't think I could ever have the confidence in my appearance to not trim it up a bit. I'd hate for anyone who sees me naked to think I'm slovenly, unkempt, or disinterested.
My performance is... less than ideal.
It's not to say I was excited or terribly happy to see anyone else lose, as much as I'd rather people not see me in my entirety.
I had intended to only show this to one person. But I can always fix that later, I suppose.
I'll try to look as pretty as possible, not that I'm desperate for attention or anything.
Oh, that wasn't so hard! It's like you're inviting me into your lives. Just for this one moment. Isn't that poetic and beautiful?
Be careful with that scrunchie. That could kill a pigeon if it got its head caught up inside.
Please be careful with that. It could really hurt you if it snapped into your eye.
Once, I heard a kitten choked on elastic like that. Please be careful. I'd hate to see anyone get hurt.
I wonder if anyone's used a necktie to choke someone, or if that's just a rumor or a joke?
I like the color of that. If you get a nosebleed, you can wipe it up. Just make sure you wash blood out with hydrogen peroxide.
It's a surprisingly versatile tool. You'd be amazed what you can do with common objects. S-sorry, I didn't mean to make a lewd joke-- you wouldn't expect that from me, would you?
Oh... these? I had a bad accident. Those delinquents really don't know when to let up.
My scars? I cut myself. While shaving. I'm very detail oriented, and I'd hate to think someone got the wrong idea...
Oh... I suppose you can see those scars. I wouldn't worry about them. I don't.
I must have done something really bad to be getting punished like this.
No, the scars don't continue under my underwear. I'd never let anyone put something that sharp down there.
Y-you're welcome. F-for the view. J-just don't think I'm doing it f-for you.
(Strangely bracing! A-and Senpai isn't even--)
(What's this? I feel a bit...) Hm... I don't mind if you look, you know. It wouldn't hurt my feelings.
A small amount of grooming means I don't... nevermind.
I'm... particular about my appearance. I want to look good for one person. Also in particular.
...You've caught me in a lie. I hope you won't think less of me. Or about me more than you have to. But I... can be kind of clumsy.
I know my scars are so ugly. Please... don't shame me for them.
If it helps, they don't hurt at all. Not even people's cruel comments or remarks...
Oh you lost ~name~! I'll come and give you a hug... or a handshake.
I could stand with you for moral support, ~name~. Don't let me invade your personal space though.
Don't worry ~name~. Do you want me to take some clothes off so that we can feel more together in this?
Hahaha! You're so gorgeous when you blush, ~name~.
Please don't be shy, ~name~. I will stick by you right until the very end.
I-I-I-I-I was just looking at you to see if you are OK, ~name~. I'll stop!
You're so gracious in defeat, ~name~. You're so nice!
I feel like I'm beginning to warm to you, ~name~!
I'd be willing to give you something nice in return, ~name~.
If there's anything I can do to help, ~name~... ANYTHING... just name it!
You're so gallant, ~name~. Losing that round just to make the others happy.
Oh ~name~, you lost! Poor you.
I'm naked. Maybe if you're naked too, we may feel more connected to each other. Err - from a poker point of view... perhaps.
(Oh I hope ~name~ is watching me. He's so cute!)
Take your clothes off, ~name~. Come and sit with me. You might start to like me... perhaps?
Oh ~name~! You look SO cute when you lose!
Oh, how unfortunate for you ~name~.
...Well? It's rude to make a girl wait, you know.
I wonder what you have that's so interesting, you just had to come here and share it with us.
Quite the gentleman, aren't you, ~name~? Playing this game with us and all...
I hope this isn't too hard for you, ~name~. Despite what I've heard, you don't seem like the type of guy to expose himself to a bunch of girls.
What are you waiting for, ~name~? It's not like you've got some disgusting rash you want to hide from us or something... right?
...Well?
Oh, ~name~! Silly me, I almost forgot you were even here...
Just get it over with already.
Stripping after I've already finished masturbating... I bet you're disappointed.
~Name~ lost, huh? Just get it over with.(You'll never compare to him, anyways.)
I refuse to listen to the idle chitchat of others, ~name~. I'll take you as I find you.
You lost ~name~. What a shame for you.
Well, that's unfortunate.
What are you just standing around for, ~name~? It's not like whatever dissociative disorder you have is that bad.
Have you got any health insurance at all, ~name~? Not that it's important. I was just curious. Insurance is important.
I know you struggle with taking your clothes off by yourself sometimes, ~name~. Don't feel ashamed to ask for my help.
Oh dear ~name~. This must be absolutely devastating for you. I'm sure you'll get over it though.
Don't worry about me taking the attention away from you, ~name~. It's hard to ignore someone with your... situation in a crowd.
Thanks for losing the hand, ~name~. Seeing what you have going on under there will make me feel much better about my own scars.
(Good. That'll keep their eyes off of me for a while.)
(Nice job distracting them, ~name~...)
(I'll use these few seconds without your attention wisely.)
You seem like such a nice girl, ~name~. I guess all the gossip about you is completely unjustified.
Don't worry ~name~, they can barely see me down here. All eyes are on you!
...I hate that I even have to ask this, but you're not going to burst out into some infuriating catchphrase, are you? ...And you mind your business, don't you?
...Neptune. You're not... one of those people that knows a bit too much about other people, are you? ...And you don't have an enraging catchphrase, right?
This feels like a strange play for someone allegedly in love...
I... thought you loved that Sonic person. Was that not true?
An instrument that doubles as a weapon? I've never seen something like that before...
I can't say I recognize you. Are you some kind of cosplayer?
Hm... I suppose it wouldn't be that strange to see someone try out their cosplay fetish here...
So, you can... view between realities? Is that true? And not a lie?
Can you really look between universes? There's all sorts of people here but... it sounds pretty crazy to me.
...You two keep fighting. Are you sure you want to play this game together?
...You two can't seem to get along at all. Maybe it's better if Chell just leaves you here, Wheatley.
I-if you wouldn't mind, can you confirm there's a world I end up with Senpai? A-about that favor you offered. I simply must know.
Stella, about that favor I asked... can... can you make sure there's a world I end up with Senpai?
Are you... well? I don't think a... normal person would bring a knife to a game like this.
Have you been talking to yourself, Susie? That's... not a great look for strip poker.
This experience could be just the thing to get you away from all that comfort eating I hear about. I mean, you even brought food to this game.
This experience could be just the thing to get you away from all that comfort eating I hear about. I doubt that filling another hole of yours will give you that same feeling.
I would hate to see that beautiful long green hair get caught up in something mechanical, Palutena.
If you've lived for several millennia, Pearl, does that mean you're awfully hard to kill?
(I wonder what would happen if Palutena's hair got caught in a vehicle engine.)
(Maybe we could all leave Pearl alone and leave her to die of loneliness and worthlessness.)
Don't get stage fright, ~name~.
Don't worry, ~name~. While you're here with me... you'll be completely safe.
Do you have any phobias or weaknesses ~name~? Just asking.
Hey, ~name~? Did you come here alone tonight?
At least this could help you overcome any social problems you have, ~name~.
People shouldn't point and laugh at you, ~name~. So embarrassing.
I'll be here to help you if you suffer one of your anxiety attacks, ~name~.
Is it true that your last boyfriend has finally come out of the hospital, ~name~?
Err - oh, how awful for you, ~name~.
So, it's your turn to strip, ~name~? Try not to steal the show.
Hey ~name~, will you have to walk home in the dark later? Maybe I can come with you?
All eyes on you now, ~name~.
Staggering. I can't believe you lost.
Do you... hm. I wonder, ~name~. If those rumors... of course not...
This could be just the thing to help you overcome when people laugh at you in public, ~name~.
This experience could be just the thing to get you away from all that comfort eating I hear about.
It really isn't nice when people post those nasty things about you online, ~name~.
I wonder who started that nasty rumor about you and all those poor farm animals, ~name~?
You are like a delicate flower, ~name~. Just waiting to be plucked...
Let's hope that this situation doesn't bring out that nasty side of you that everyone talks about, ~name~.
You should look at the positives, ~name~. This is a great way to overcome your agoraphobia.
Huh. How... curious. Would you say this was all luck... or no small part of skill?
I... came. And you still have layers left?
(An opponent not to be underestimated...)
(This one is smart. Or lucky. She can't be allowed to come between me and Senpai.)
You survived a lot longer than I'd have imagined, ~name~... a-as in the game, obviously.
That was rather reckless of you. I hear men hate it when they misfire.
You're... looking... awfully... defenseless, Brock.
Don't cry ~name~-kun. Everything is fine!
You look so cute removing your ~clothing~, ~name~! (I hope that was convincing.)
(Is ~name~ looking at me...? How frustrating. But maybe I can use him...)
Your ~clothing~? Is that... such a big deal...?
We can appreciate your defeat, ~name~. Nothing worth having can be found easily.
Oh... I treat every item equally. Sometimes the smaller things are the most... dang-- delightful.
Wow, ~name~. It's a good thing men like you aren't impressive when you undress. You can show off your brains... or something...
Hm. That's it? ...Sorry if that's rude. I think you'd be used to that by now, ~name~.
You're so dedicated to the rules of the game, ~name~. Truly impressive.
Hm. Are you sure, ~name~? Wouldn't you want to give us a bit more exposure than that?
Not many people like you here, are there, ~name~? Doesn't that feel... lonely?
...~Clothing~... (Could I use that in order to dispose of someone? If it got caught in a woodchipper, maybe.)
Say, ~name~, is there anyone you know who'd be interested in your ~clothing~...? ...I'd like to buy something similar for a friend and want to know how valuable it is.
Oh... ~name~... I see you're trying to be... modest.
Isn't it a bit awkward when a man like ~name~ doesn't protect a girl from showing off... considerably more?
Hahaha! You're so funny, ~name~! You always know what to say to make me laugh... or do.

I could comfort you, ~name~. Maybe you already have someone who comforts you already though?
...I doubt it.
You look so handsome this evening, ~name~! Wow...! (This can't possibly be all it takes...)
I-I shouldn't admit I'm getting turned on by your ~clothing~...! Oh no... did that... (Simpleton.)
...Well chosen, ~name~. I can't complain that you're trying to win, I suppose.
Take any longer and I'm sure you'll be feeling quite differently about the view.
Hm. I see how it is, ~name~.
(Should I do this in a ladylike way, or just go for it like a complete slut? I just don't know how ~name~ will react to me... Senpai... do the opposite of how you'd do it for Senpai...)
(Should I keep my legs closed to look humble and decent... or maybe open them a bit to excite ~name~'s attention? Why's it so hard to know? How can I manipulate him...?)
(That you'd see this before Senpai is unforgivable. Or... hm. Is there a way to use even this...?)
(Clearly not the type to shy away from confrontation...)
Exhibitionism isn't very interesting, ~name~.
Your ~clothing~? Are you trying to distract us? That's... unique. But not very amusing.
Your ~clothing~. There's a way you can hurt someone with one of them... so I'm told.
You're such a great stripper, ~name~! You must've really practiced.
Did you prepare for this, ~name~? I'm so impressed.
Isn't this a dream come true, ~name~? Relaxing. Lowering your guard... taking off your ~clothing~ after a long day...
If it looks like I'm staring at you... I'm just thinking of another boy I know. But maybe you're competitive like that.
Do you need for me to look after your ~clothing~, ~name~? It would be a shame if ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ fell into the wrong hands.
That's all, ~name~? But what if you wanted to distract the other girls?
Girls like a vulnerable man, ~name~. I wish you'd show off a bit more...
Moving on...
(People really play this? For fun?)
(I should just grab my clothes and leave while I still can...)
Ah, that's it, then?
Oh... That's it, isn't it?
(Have I really been losing that badly?)
(How dare he humiliate me like this...)
(Plenty to strangle with, at least.)
I suppose that's not the only small thing we'll remove from you tonight, ~name~...
Woooow, ~name~, you really know how to make something so... useless enticing.
~Name~! Goodness. Your poker playing skills have melted my heart. Truly.
Oh, I'll certainly fall for you after a few more layers, ~name~.
Huh. She left. We can do that...? Well. I guess we could. If we had something to hide like Florina.
A shame she left, but you can't blame her. I wouldn't want to get naked with her... issues, either.
...You know, it's very suspicious that she'd just leave...
A shame she's more interested in running than... appearing normal and adhering to the terms of the game. What could be wrong with her...?
I... I thought it was strange a butterfly was undressing. W-what would you even have taken off? Your wings? That would hurt. A lot.
What's... what's this? Am I hallucinating?
That's a rather curious weapon. What kind of weather can you create? Rain to wash away... spills? Lightning to... incapacitate someone? Wind...?

It seems rather important, Nami. It also appears functional. What does your log pose do exactly? Does it.... how much of your navigation comes from that thing on your wrist, and how much from your own head?
Despite how elaborate your uniform is... you're a student too, aren't you? Interesting.
You're really a student, then? You just looked... a lot different than what I'm used to.
You need them to escape...? Are you in danger very often?
Are you often in danger? That's a surprise to me.
(Something like that could be useful if the Light Music Club ever comes into play. I might be able to get my hands on it after the game is over...)
And what could that be...?
That wouldn't be something... nefarious, would it, Nami?
...Hm... I see. (At least this one's a little less mobile than Pamu. I wonder if she's as durable...)
I see. That's interesting. (Keep talking. And hopefully we don't have to test if you get as much joy out of being stabbed as Pamu.)
...Sorry, it just seems hard to believe. Where I come from, people are just flesh and bone. There's no magic.
...There's no magic where I come from. I'm just... I believe you. I think the others might not, that's all.
Despite your lack of teamwork, you two really don't like being caught off guard, do you?
...Huh. You two are... you seem remarkably ambush-resistant.
This charming little display lets you ignore that you're fundamentally performing for an audience more interested in those tricks ending, hm?
Hm. Well... I want what's best for you. But also not to die.
They say you shouldn't cross a maniac with a knife, you know. So... I guess we just have to keep playing.
Try looking inside my mind, Alice. You'll work out who is the true murderer out of the two of us.
So, can men only pretend to kiss you, Alpha-chan, due to you being a hologram?
Is it possible for your A.I. to malfunction, Alpha? Could you become randomly violent?
I love your music, Alpha-chan! It'll be sad when people become bored and forget you.
Your emotions are so lifelike, Alpha. I cannot tell that they are fake.
Do holograms bleed, Alpha?
It's great how Team RWBY stick together, Blake. Don't you ever worry what would happen if one of you went rogue?
You could make an effort to be somewhat interesting, Daria.
Nobody is immortal, Evie. Nobody.
It must feel terrible to be ignored by a man you love. Right, Harley?
(I'd love to bend Korra up like a pretzel.)
I often wonder exactly how in control of your violent tendencies you are, Leela.
Meg, is it true that when you were a kid, your father ran away from home?
Do you ever worry that you may Cryo-Freeze yourself and never wake up, Mei?
If you're a surgeon, Mercy, then you must be very used to the sight of blood.
(I hear that Palutena never joins her army on the battlefield. What kind of Goddess is that?)
So come on, Miss Pauling. Exactly how many people have you murdered?
Hey toadstool girl? Have you ever eaten a baked toad?
It's not absolutely obvious that you've been genetically altered, Wanda.
Have you been sent to assassinate me, Sheena?
I admire you for playing this game Tracer, despite your chronal disassociation condition.
Come to my place and let me cook you a nice okonomiyaki, Videl!
(I will stab Alice before she gets the chance to stab me.)
(I wonder if Alpha could be reprogrammed to stab herself.)
(I wonder if Alpha could be cut with a holographic knife.)
