(Hmmm... If I killed Blake, I'd have to kill all three of her friends too.)
(I'd like to permanently rid Daria of that annoying smug look she has on her face.)
(I don't know if Evie can be killed, but I'm happy to try again and again.)
(Harley has a choice. Die of a broken heart or a broken neck.)
(Leela doesn't intimidate me. I could outwit her in a fight to the death.)
(Daylight or nighttime, anytime is a good time for Meg's death.)
(Mei deserves to be frozen permanently.)
(Mercy would look great if her head was surgically removed.)
(That Miss Pauling is so smug. She thinks she's clever, but I know she's a murdering bitch.)
(It would be fun to lock Peach in the dungeon of her own castle and leave her to rot.)
(I know Wanda is genetically altered, but I wouldn't mind physically altering her.)
(I have to kill Sheena before she kills me.)
(I could kill Tracer, rewind time, kill her again... rewind... kill... rewind... kill!)
(I will cook a pancake for Videl. I'll top it with pigeon droppings.)
You... didn't know? It would be a shame if someone found out that you played a game like this.
It sounds like this sort of thing is terribly out of character for you, Catria. Is there someone you wouldn't want knowing about your lascivious desires...?
It must be terrible knowing that there are all these horrible whispers going around about you, ~name~.
Have you learned to control that bad temper yet, ~name~?
I often worry about you, ~name~.
You should be very careful whilst going home later, ~name~.
Did... someone say a nasty accident is going to happen to you soon, ~name~? I don't think it's true, though.
I'm really quite concerned about what is going to happen to you, ~name~.
How dreadful that you lost ~name~.
I've got a bad feeling that you're headed for trouble, ~name~.
Oh... Wow... I can't believe that you'd take that off... just shocking.
...~Clothing~... Well. Okay then.
I hope you don't overreact to losing this hand, ~name~. It's just that someone told me last time...
I've got a bad feeling that you're headed for trouble, ~name~.
Keep going, ~name~. It's so nice that not many people associate with you with your condition.
Impressive, ~name~.
Really? Your ~clothing~ was so interesting, though.
Your ~clothing~? I'm shocked. I figured you'd have more sentiment, ~name~.
The last time I saw a girl wearing... Ah... nevermind.
...Oh, so you're taking off your... very exciting. So interesting.
It's so funny when girls wear their ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|~clothing~s)~ when they don't need to. It's a bit silly, don't you think?
Your ~clothing~ should be put in a safe place. I would hate for something to happen to you. Or your ~clothing~.
I can't believe you lost that one, ~name~. I feel really, really, really, really sorry for you. Honestly.
Are you really expecting to impress anyone?
(...Hm. Are there any club meetings after this?)
Fascinating, ~name~.
Wow. It's such a good thing you took your ~clothing~ off. It'd be just such a pity if you were to get hung up on it.
Hm. I suppose it's not worth that much, in the scheme of things. A good thing you definitely can't say that about the person who was wearing it.
Don't you get really angry when you hear about people talking behind your back, ~name~?
~Clothing~, what every girl dreams of masturbating to. I assume.
(Would Senpai like it if I wore ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ like ~name~'s...? Or... ~name~'s...?)
I thought most girls would rather undress in front of their special someone... but I guess yours isn't that special. Your ~clothing~, I mean.
Hm... (Could ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ be used to incriminate ~name~...? She'd never expect me to...)
Amazing. I'm undressed, and you still... I can't tell if you don't notice me or don't care...
...Oh. It seems rather dumb to get upset over torn ~clothing~. It's torn already, right?
I hope that gold is real, Palutena. If it's fake, your arms will turn gangrene and fall off. How sad.
(How these types manage to survive past highschool is a mystery to me.)
You didn't strike me as a delinquent. But I guess with your hair and how you're dressed, you're not afraid of a brawl, are you?
I'm surprised you're not just wearing it over your shoulders, like a delinquent. That's the pugilistic style you're going for, isn't it?
(On second thought... it seems like it's incredibly precious to her. Stealing something like that, especially something so large, with so many witnesses would practically be suicide.)
...Now, if you could help me, I'd find that pretty amazing.
Hm... well... I trust you. But... I think I could really believe you if you could do me a small favor... it's rather embarrassing, if I'm being honest.
...Hm. Perhaps Wheatley has lead you into all those... unfortunate circumstances. It can't be a coincidence that he's always there when things go wrong, can it?
...Hm. I don't know. It'd be easy for you to... ah, confabulate what Chell's trying to say, Wheatley. You could be making all kinds of trouble for her...
I don't know about everyone else, but I feel very uncomfortable with the idea of being murdered in the middle of a friendly game of cards.
I'm just so... scared. Who wants to play a game with a killer?
I hear that when it comes to men, that you are prone to fits of violence, Sheena.
(I would never treat my man the way that Sheena does. What a bitch!
Did you forget you had your ~clothing~? Are you always this... oblivious, ~name~?
Sigh. Your ~clothing~? And after you're already showing your most intimate parts. I guess the rumors we're true.
Be careful, ~name~... you wouldn't want to have that belt be... misused during those deviant sex acts.
That looks like it's pretty heavy duty. Enough to support your weight, ~name~? Or do you prefer to be sitting when you... oh, I shouldn't say anything else...
You look so beautiful, ~name~, even with that... thing stuck in your teeth.
Don't have an anxiety attack over it, ~name~.
The boys will definitely start looking at you when you take something important off.
Don't worry if no-one seems interested in you, ~name~. There's plenty of time left.
It's not any sort of big deal. It's just your ~clothing~, ~name~.
I'm sure as the game goes on, someone will show an interest in you, ~name~.
~Name~, you are sooo beautiful! It doesn't even matter that your voice is slightly annoying.
There is someone, somewhere on this planet who will show an interest in you one day, ~name~.
Wow, ~name~. You're really making sure to give an impression about being chaste!
Gosh. And here I thought those rumors about you being a prude were...
I really wish people would stop with those lies about you being unattractive, ~name~. So bad.
Aw, don't get spooked, ~name~. I'm sure nothing bad's going to happen.
Did the police ever catch up with you that time, ~name~?
Why are you staring at me, ~name~, ~player~? Is there some sort of issue?
I found you on a website the other day, ~name~. You're very... accommodating.
After what I'd heard about you, I'm surprised that you're... going so slow during this game.
...Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(weren't|wasn't)~... borrowed from that store, was it?
It's pretty amazing that you can wear your ~clothing~ with such confidence.
I'm sure that after today, people will want to start associating with you, ~name~.
You didn't need to wear that anyway, ~name~.
Oh, you took off your ~clothing~, ~name~. Sorry, It's... more interesting than watching paint dry, at least.
A shame your skill at surviving in strip poker doesn't translate to other useful skills... you'd be pretty popular!
Don't worry, ~name~. I know you're not trying to show off. Nobody likes a braggart.
...Could it be that you're going to leave that in someone's bag?
Wow! That's the... I can't even find a word for it.
You know, if you talked a little less, ~name~, then you might come across as very attractive.
You can't see very much of me, but at least you can see very little of ~name~ too, now!
Oh... ~name~... normally if you want to draw someone's orgasm out, you have to tease them, not disappoint them.
